catalogue_raissonne: Hagiwara Hideo hanga sakuhin mokuroku 2013, no. 484
description: abstract image with a multicolored triangle in UR over a deconstructed face (two eyes, mouth); below, a hand-like shape rests over two green bent lines; a checkboard pattern in triangle shape on left side, with blue, yellow, and pink shapes above and two pink crescent shapes below; a diagonal bar of yellow runs from left edge to bottom edge, with a black line stairstepping below and a black patch of lines near bottom edge
medium: Woodblock print; ink and color on paper
title: Clown No. 2
